Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'Yeah, I'm fine. This new look kinda slays, I'm not gonna lie.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Bucketina-Chan giggles as she looks me up and down.

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: 'Ok, silly. I think I have to agree with you.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Bucketina-Chan looks down and I soon realize she's blushing.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: And now, out of nowhere, that worried expression on her face returns.

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: 'I, uh... Lost my car keys. I really don't want to walk home alone. Have you seen them?'
